name: Green Journey
description:
Green Journey a small boy lost his way back home, he was born in the green village he had to past red and blue villager house before he can reach home, but monster is all around the villager house he had to try to avoid them and clear the level.

Instructions

Player must collect star before the door will open for the next level and overcome obstacles in each level.

1st Level: Easy / Beginners adapt to the jumping and movement

  • Collect 5 stars
  • Door will open

2nd Level: Medium / Challenging   

  • Collect 5 stars
  • Harder Obstacles to Jump

3rd Level: Hard / High level Patience

  • Obstacles

Use Arrows Keys to Control:

  • Up: Jump
  • Left: Move left
  • Right: Move right
